channel.title: cybolic music podcast
channel.description: official cybolic podcast for electronic music
channel.itunes:subtitle: podcast for electronic music
channel.itunes:summary: podcast for electronic music from berlin, germany. regulary updated twice a month. you can enjoy techno, minimal and house music mixed by our artists
channel.itunes:author: martin.klang
channel.itunes:keywords: podcast, cybolic, techno, minimal, house, berlin, club, music, live, mix

item.title: Ratatouille 12" - [A] Luminous
item.description: A-Seite der Ratatouille EP aus 2007. Enjoy!

item.title: podcast #008
item.description: Freshly squeezed :D the 8th episode of our cybolic podcast with Tracks from: Chris Rockz, Alessio Mereu, Patrick Arbez, Boris Brejcha, De Hessejung, David Suono, Pig & Dan, Antonio Forester, Dee Green, Phil Kieran, Levon Dimitri, Junior Rivera, Daniel Bob and many more. Straight forward techno to the floor ;) recommendations and feedback welcome as usual. Enjoy! Cheers, Martin
